import pandas_profiling as pp 
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

source.7d54909d:
plt.figure(figsize = (40,20)) 
ax = plt.subplots()
ax = sns.barplot(x = cars['model'],y = cars['price'])
ax = sns.countplot(cars['model'].astype(str).sort_values(), color = 'MediumSlateBlue')
ax.set(xlabel  = 'models',ylabel = 'price')
source.8ddcf053:
plt.figure(figsize = (30,20))
alexa = plt.subplots()
alexa= sns.barplot(x = 'fuelType' , y ='price' ,data = cars,palette = 'rainbow')
alexa = sns.countplot(cars['fuelType'] ,color = '#4B0082')
alexa.set(xlabel = 'fuelType',ylabel = 'price')
plt.show()

import statsmodels.formula.api as snf
source.b0cde5d4: b = snf.ols(formula = 'price ~    transmission  + fuelType + tax+  year +  model + engineSize  + mileage + mpg ', data = cars).fit()
